item.title: 2022 Dwarves Renaissance A Year End Rewind
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Successfully went through 2022, a year that we might say - a new record: team reached highest growth record, kickstarted community engagement, home, compliance training & individual development are speeding up, and a whole new place to call Dwarves. Weâ€™ve achieved to this yearâ€™s resolution: A team that cares about how to build software right and can teach others on that. TEAM GROWTH 30 New Team Members 2022 matched us with the 80th Dwarves.
